name: TGATS - First Day
description:
TGATS - First Day is a prologue to the main game. It's not a DEMO, it's a totally new episode! Download for free and enjoy!

The Guilt and the Shadow is a "short story exploration game" about the past, death, illness and the thin line between life and insanity. A 2D puzzle platformer inspired by the old point and click games.

To buy the main game go to the itch.io page:
http://oophok.itch.io/tgats

or get it on steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/332630/
